short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to avoid opening multiple tabs of the same site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabMergeX is your smart tab companion that optimizes your browsing experience. Say goodbye to cluttered tabs! TabMergeX intelligently manages your open tabs, preventing duplicate tabs and reducing tab overload. When you open a website that's already active in another tab, TabMergeX springs into action with a helpful popup, giving you the power to decide whether to switch to the existing tab or continue where you are. Enjoy seamless browsing with TabMergeX's intuitive tab management and stay organized effortlessly!
